content: while this **cheese doodle cowl** may seem like a ridiculously silly april fool s joke with fangirl fibers 1 yarnaceous fibers 2 where we created a spoof-like doodle inspired by our favorite cheeses **it s actually a totally real pattern and it s free ** **the cheese doodle** is inspired by our very serious love of all things cheesy whether it s cheesy jokes or cheesy nachos grab your favorite cheese and get ready to slice into a delicious new design **10 cheese doodle motifs** included are cheese slices cheese wedges blue cheese gouda single slice cheese slices spray cheese nacho cheese grilled cheese and cheesecake **love this cheesy pattern ** check out the 2024 april fools pattern the potato doodle 3 also free and **shop cheesy yarn kits** by fangirl fibers 4 or yarnaceous fibers 5 too **size s ** approx 16 20 24 28 32 in 40 50 60 70 80 cm finished cowl circumference* **measurements** height 8 10 12 12 14 in 20 25 30 30 35 cm **yarn** any dk light worsted or sport weight yarn suggested yarn cheese doodle cowl kit by yarnaceous fibers 6 and fangirl fibers 7 merino dk base 100% superwash merino wool 100 g skeins 231 yards 211 m yardage listed in total yards per size due to the customizable nature of this pattern * 200 300 430 500 675 yards 183 274 393 457 617 meters **needles** main fabric us 5/3 75 mm or size to obtain gauge ribbing us 4/3 5 mm or one size smaller than gauge 24 or 32 in 60 or 80 cm circular needles depending on size selected **gauge** 24 sts and 24 row per 4 in 10 cm in colorwork **notions** stitch markers one in different color
